title: Bug 138175: Bookmark link set in drill through link not saved in Hyperlink Options dialog
description: When creating a drill-through link and selecting a target bookmark, the selected bookmark is not displayed in the Hyperlink Options dialog as expected.
OB: Upon reopening the Hyperlink Options dialog, the selected bookmark is no longer visible, although it is saved in the XML source.
EB: The expected behavior is that the selected target bookmark should be displayed in the Hyperlink Options dialog when it is reopened. It should not disappear from the dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the bug:
1. Define a drill-through link.
2. Select a target bookmark in the link settings.
